title: The Place of Dead Roads: A Novel
description: A good old-fashioned shoot-out in the American West of the frontier days serves as the springboard for this hyperkinetic adventure in which gunslingers lead by Kim Carson fight for galactic William S. Burroughs was born in St. Louis in 1914.His many other works include NAKED LUNCH and JUNKY.Described by Norman Mailer as one of America’s few writers genuinely “possessed by genius,“ he died in 1997.
author: William S. Burroughs
